description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0)=T(n,n)=1 for n >= 0; T(n,1)=T(n,n-1)=[ 3n/2 ] for n >= 1; T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-1)+T(n-1,k) for 2<=k<=n-2, n >= 4.
links: Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: T(n, k) = number of paths from (0, 0) to (n-k, k) in the directed graph having vertices (i, j) and edges (i, j)-to-(i+1, j) and (i, j)-to-(i, j+1) for i, j >= 0 and edges (i, j)-to-(i+1, j+1) for i=0, j >= 0 and even and for j=0, i >= 0 and even.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
